featured_projects.title: MD TalkMan - SwiftUI Audio Reader
featured_projects.description: A hands-free SwiftUI app that reads markdown files aloud for drivers. Features premium iOS Text-To-Speech voices, CarPlay support, AppleWatch Controls, GitHub sync, and intelligent audio session management for safe, accessible learning while driving.

featured_projects.title: TechHub E-commerce Platform
featured_projects.description: A modern React e-commerce store showcasing electronics with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Zustand state management. Features shopping cart, product details, and responsive design integrated with Platzi Fake Store API for realistic product data.

featured_projects.title: Microservices Backend Catalog API
featured_projects.description: Node.js microservice backend for e-commerce catalog management with basic Elasticsearch search, Redis caching, and PostgreSQL storage. Features comprehensive testing, structured logging, and Docker containerization.

featured_projects.title: Guenyang Hae - Full-Stack Todo App
featured_projects.description: A todo application with Go backend. Features a modern SvelteKit frontend with advanced task filtering, priority sorting, project organization, and responsive mobile design.

featured_projects.title: Personal Website & Blog
featured_projects.description: A mathematics-focused blog built with Astro featuring custom MDX shortcodes, portfolio showcase, and optimized performance. Demonstrates modern static site generation with dynamic content management and responsive design.
